text:
RT @Not1Bean: Climate friendly coffees are never shipped more than once, direct emission reductions by corporates must be the priority.
@en‚Ä¶
RT @janey_wall: @EmBeck2015 @stophs2 @EnvAgency See @PJennings88: ‚Äú6 years ago we predicted #HS2 would apply to @EnvAgency to approve tunne‚Ä¶

RT @Feargal_Sharkey: "More than 14,000 breaches of environmental permits occurred in 2019".

And the @EnvAgency does what exactly?

@_RobbieMoore @bradfordmdc @EnvAgency @AireIncinerator Later a site that was identified as unsuitable and unavailble in that test (despite being up for sale at the time) was also developed (also in a flood zone) by the same applicant!
RT @janey_wall: #HS2 has finally applied to @EnvAgency for permission to send TBMs thru Misbourne Valley‚Äôs fractured chalk. We risk losing‚Ä¶
RT @JMU69361443: I am very concerned about risk to the chalk aquifer (  vital public water source ) by HS2 tunnelling in the Chilterns. @En‚Ä¶

@_RobbieMoore @bradfordmdc @EnvAgency @AireIncinerator I find it facinating what Labour in Bradford has approved in recent years, in particular a certain site in a flood zone that certainly didn't meet the required 'Sequential and Exemptions' test, but yet was approved only a few years ago.
RT @janey_wall: @EmBeck2015 @stophs2 @EnvAgency See @PJennings88: ‚Äú6 years ago we predicted #HS2 would apply to @EnvAgency to approve tunne‚Ä¶
RT @BeeWilson3: @janey_wall @EnvAgency #StopHS2  Why cant this nightmare stop,  it is a curse across the country. ¬£ 56 billion nightmare ru‚Ä¶

entity.name: Good Morning Britain
entity.description: Good morning, Britain. Up early and need to catch up on the latest news, weather and sports? Then this weekday morning programme is for you, offering the latest information in such areas as entertainment, health and money. `Good Morning Britain' is the typical morning news and talk show. It features a number of presenters, correspondents and reporters covering what you should know to start your day before heading out the door.

entity.name: Good Morning Britain
entity.description: Good morning, Britain. Up early and need to catch up on the latest news, weather and sports? Then this weekday morning programme is for you, offering the latest information in such areas as entertainment, health and money. `Good Morning Britain' is the typical morning news and talk show. It features a number of presenters, correspondents and reporters covering what you should know to start your day before heading out the door.
